titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse under construction at 510 19th Street, Bakersfield, California, as the Myron Donovan Crocker United States Courthouse.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

bill.summary: 7/26/2011--Introduced. Designates the U.S. courthouse under construction at 510 19th Street, Bakersfield, California, as the "Myron Donovan Crocker United States Courthouse."
